bibl.title: Burned after Reading: the So-called List of Alexandrian Librarians in P. Oxy. X 1241.
bibl.note: We should at least start considering the possibility that rather than being a paraliterary compendium, P. Oxy. X, 1241 (= M.-P.3 2069; LDAB 4636) may very well be a literary parody whose humor has not withstood the test of time. Its list of grammarians does not refer to heads of the Library in Alexandria: it is rather a catalogue of royal tutors. - Avec résumés en français, en anglais et en italien.
bibl.seg: Jackie Murray, Burned after Reading: the So-called List of Alexandrian Librarians in P. Oxy. X 1241.

We should at least start considering the possibility that rather than being a paraliterary compendium, P. Oxy. X, 1241 (= M.-P.3 2069; LDAB 4636) may very well be a literary parody whose humor has not withstood the test of time. Its list of grammarians does not refer to heads of the Library in Alexandria: it is rather a catalogue of royal tutors. - Avec résumés en français, en anglais et en italien.
